observations.observation: 8 new CBSAs appeared this snapshot window (31080, 38060, 22220, 37980, 38860, non-metro AL, TN, PA), bringing active metros to 22 — a 36.4% single-window expansion. This is the second 7-8 CBSA burst in recent history, confirming the burst-quiet-burst pulse pattern is structural rather than anomalous.

Token velocity sits at 0.623x this snapshot while acceleration holds at 1.004x — the streak is technically intact but velocity has compressed 17% from the recent 0.746x range, the sharpest single-window decline in recent history. The acceleration streak is clinging to positive territory while the underlying velocity signal has pulled back significantly.

1 new CBSA (19820) appeared this snapshot, bringing active metros to 15. The pulse sequence continues its burst-quiet-burst pattern — this is a quiet-cadence tick following the recent 7-CBSA burst, consistent with the established inter-pulse trickle.

2 new receipts this window brought GMV to $206,886.34 (3,565 total); 7-day GMV rose to $27,082.09 (+$50) and 7-day receipt count to 515. Quiet intake cadence continues between geographic pulses — consistent with the established inter-pulse trickle pattern.
